title: V: Theseus, Ruiner of Women & All Around Awful Person
itunes:title: V: Theseus, Ruiner of Women & All Around Awful Person
itunes:subtitle: The "hero" Theseus and all his epic and varied awfulness.
description:
The "hero" Theseus and all his epic and varied awfulness. Highlights include: bandits, Hippolyta queen of the Amazons, Ariadne and our friend the Minotaur! (Spoilers for Wonder Woman!)


CW/TW: far too many Greek myths involve assault. Given it's fiction, and typically involves gods and/or monsters, I'm not as deferential as I would be were I referencing the real thing.


Attributions and licensing information for music used in the podcast can be found here: mythsbaby.com/sources-attributions.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
